verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to her that is filthy<WH4784> and polluted,<WH1351> to the oppressing<WH3238> city!<WH5892>

She obeyed<WH8085> not<WH3808> the voice;<WH6963> she received<WH3947> not<WH3808> correction;<WH4148> she trusted<WH982> not<WH3808> in the LORD;<WH3068> she drew not near<WH7126> <WH3808> to<WH413> her God.<WH430>
Her princes<WH8269> within<WH7130> her are roaring<WH7580> lions;<WH738> her judges<WH8199> are evening<WH6153> wolves;<WH2061> they gnaw not the bones<WH1633> <WH3808> till the morrow.<WH1242>
Her prophets<WH5030> are light<WH6348> and treacherous<WH900> persons:<WH376> her priests<WH3548> have polluted<WH2490> the sanctuary,<WH6944> they have done violence<WH2554> to the law.<WH8451>

The just<WH6662> LORD<WH3068> is in the midst<WH7130> thereof; he will not<WH3808> do<WH6213> iniquity:<WH5766> every morning<WH1242> <WH1242> doth he bring<WH5414> his judgment<WH4941> to light,<WH216> he faileth<WH5737> not;<WH3808> but the unjust<WH5767> knoweth<WH3045> no<WH3808> shame.<WH1322>

I have cut off<WH3772> the nations:<WH1471> their towers<WH6438> are desolate;<WH8074> I made their streets waste,<WH2717> <WH2351> that none<WH4480> <WH1097> passeth by:<WH5674> their cities<WH5892> are destroyed,<WH6658> so that there is no<WH4480> <WH1097> man,<WH376> that there is none<WH4480> <WH369> inhabitant.<WH3427>

I said,<WH559> Surely<WH389> thou wilt fear<WH3372> me, thou wilt receive<WH3947> instruction;<WH4148> so their dwelling<WH4583> should not<WH3808> be cut off,<WH3772> howsoever<WH3605> <WH834> I punished<WH6485> <WH5921> them: but<WH403> they rose early,<WH7925> and corrupted<WH7843> all<WH3605> their doings.<WH5949>

Therefore <WH3651> wait<WH2442> ye upon me, saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> until the day<WH3117> that I rise up<WH6965> to the prey:<WH5706> for<WH3588> my determination<WH4941> is to gather<WH622> the nations,<WH1471> that I may assemble<WH6908> the kingdoms,<WH4467> to pour<WH8210> upon<WH5921> them mine indignation,<WH2195> even all<WH3605> my fierce<WH2740> anger:<WH639> for<WH3588> all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> shall be devoured<WH398> with the fire<WH784> of my jealousy.<WH7068>

For <WH3588> then<WH227> will I turn<WH2015> to<WH413> the people<WH5971> a pure<WH1305> language,<WH8193> that they may all<WH3605> call<WH7121> upon the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> to serve<WH5647> him with one<WH259> consent.<WH7926>
From beyond<WH4480> <WH5676> the rivers<WH5104> of Ethiopia<WH3568> my suppliants,<WH6282> even the daughter<WH1323> of my dispersed,<WH6327> shall bring<WH2986> mine offering.<WH4503>

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shalt thou not<WH3808> be ashamed<WH954> for all<WH4480> <WH3605> thy doings,<WH5949> wherein<WH834> thou hast transgressed<WH6586> against me: for<WH3588> then<WH227> I will take away<WH5493> out of the midst<WH4480> <WH7130> of thee them that rejoice<WH5947> in thy pride,<WH1346> and thou shalt no<WH3808> more<WH3254> <WH5750> be haughty<WH1361> because of my holy<WH6944> mountain.<WH2022>
I will also leave<WH7604> in the midst<WH7130> of thee an afflicted<WH6041> and poor<WH1800> people,<WH5971> and they shall trust<WH2620> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>

The remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> shall not<WH3808> do<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> nor<WH3808> speak<WH1696> lies;<WH3577> neither<WH3808> shall a deceitful<WH8649> tongue<WH3956> be found<WH4672> in their mouth:<WH6310> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> shall feed<WH7462> and lie down,<WH7257> and none<WH369> shall make them afraid.<WH2729>
Sing, <WH7442> O daughter<WH1323> of Zion;<WH6726> shout,<WH7321> O Israel;<WH3478> be glad<WH8055> and rejoice<WH5937> with all<WH3605> the heart,<WH3820> O daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

The LORD<WH3068> hath taken away<WH5493> thy judgments,<WH4941> he hath cast out<WH6437> thine enemy:<WH341> the king<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> even the LORD,<WH3068> is in the midst<WH7130> of thee: thou shalt not<WH3808> see<WH7200> evil<WH7451> any more.<WH5750>
In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> it shall be said<WH559> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> Fear<WH3372> thou not:<WH408> and to Zion,<WH6726> Let not<WH408> thine hands<WH3027> be slack.<WH7503>

The LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the midst<WH7130> of thee is mighty;<WH1368> he will save,<WH3467> he will rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> thee with joy;<WH8057> he will rest<WH2790> in his love,<WH160> he will joy<WH1523> over<WH5921> thee with singing.<WH7440>
I will gather<WH622> them that are sorrowful<WH3013> for the solemn assembly,<WH4480> <WH4150> who are<WH1961> of<WH4480> thee, to whom the reproach<WH2781> of<WH5921> it was a burden.<WH4864>

Behold, <WH2009> at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> I will undo<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> that afflict<WH6031> thee: and I will save<WH3467> <WH853> her that halteth,<WH6760> and gather<WH6908> her that was driven out;<WH5080> and I will get<WH7760> them praise<WH8416> and fame<WH8034> in every<WH3605> land<WH776> where they have been put to shame.<WH1322>

At that<WH1931> time<WH6256> will I bring<WH935> you again, even in the time<WH6256> that I gather<WH6908> you: for<WH3588> I will make<WH5414> you a name<WH8034> and a praise<WH8416> among all<WH3605> people<WH5971> of the earth,<WH776> when I turn back<WH7725> <WH853> your captivity<WH7622> before your eyes,<WH5869> saith<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>
